actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Public Assistance and Unemployment Compensation.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Assistance and Unemployment Compensation

official_title: A bill to provide that the Federal Government shall assume 100 per centum of all Federal, State, and local welfare costs.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Health and Human Services to pay all costs incurred by State or local governments in carrying out a welfare or public assistance program.

titles.title: A bill to provide that the Federal Government shall assume 100 per centum of all Federal, State, and local welfare costs.
